name: Kennerly
description: Kennerly is a gangling old man with waxy skin and yellow-tinged eyes. He wears bib overalls and a sour frown.
default dialogue: "The name's Kennerly. Long days and pleasant nights to ya."

name: Allie
description: Allie has straw-colored hair and a livid scar that corkscrews across her forehead. She had once been pretty, maybe even beautiful, but the world has moved on since then. One of the straps of her dirty blue dress is fastened with a metal safety pin.
default dialogue: "G'day, sai," says Allie. "What can I do ya for?"
